name: Panda x Zebra v Santa Claus
name_original: Panda x Zebra v Santa Claus
description:
Santa Claus must pay for his crimes! Will our heroes Peanut Panda and the Ferocious Zebra bring him to justice?

A game made for the libGDX Jam of December 2019.

Default Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move, Z to attack.
